ruleset.name: Apex Documentation Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex documentation standards

rule.name: ValidGroupTagValues
rule.message: ApexDoc @group tag must be one of: Class, Interface, Enum, Method, Property, Variable
rule.description:
ApexDoc @group tags must use one of the allowed values: Class, Interface, Enum, Method, Property, or Variable. This ensures consistent grouping and categorization of documented elements.
Version: 1.0.0
